component.name: GoldenCheetah
component.summary: Cycling and triathlon performance analysis software

description.p: GoldenCheetah is a powerful desktop application for cyclists, triathletes, and coaches to analyze training data and optimize performance.

ul.li: Analyze rides using summary metrics like BikeStress, TRIMP, and RPE
Extract insights via models like Critical Power and W'bal
Track and predict performance using Banister and PMC models
Train indoors with ANT+ and Bluetooth smart trainers
Upload and download from cloud services including Strava and Withings
Import and export data from a wide range of bike computers and file formats

description.p: GoldenCheetah provides tools for users to develop their own metrics, models, and charts using a powerful built-in scripting language, embedded Python, or R.
